heading: HR02069
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON LOCAL  GOVERNMENT TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ALLEGED ANOMALOUS PRACTICE BY THE LOCAL GOVERNMENTS IN THE PROVINCE OF MISAMIS OCCIDENTAL SUCH AS BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE MUNICIPALITIES OF SINACABAN AND DON VICTORINO IN THE SECOND LEGISLATIVE DISTRICT OF USING THEIR  INTERNAL REVENUE ALLOTMENT FOR THE PURCHASE OF GROSSLY OVERPRICED CONSTRUCTION EQUIPMENT OR THEIR PENCHANT OF USING THEIR INTERNAL REVENUE ALLOTMENT AS COLLATERAL IN OBTAINING LOANS FOR WHATEVER PURPOSE IT MAY SERVE THEM
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-08-15
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02069
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON LOCAL GOVERNMENT TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ALLEGED ANOMALOUS PRACTICE BY THE LOCAL GOVERNMENTS IN THE PROVINCE OF MISAMIS OCCIDENTAL SUCH AS BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE MUNICIPALITIES OF SINACABAN AND DON VICTORINO IN THE SECOND LEGISLATIVE DISTRICT OF USING THEIR INTERNAL REVENUE ALLOTMENT FOR THE PURCHASE OF GROSSLY OVERPRICED CONSTRUCTION EQUIPMENT OR THEIR PENCHANT OF USING THEIR INTERNAL REVENUE ALLOTMENT AS COLLATERAL IN OBTAINING LOANS FOR WHATEVER PURPOSE IT MAY SERVE THEM
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : OAMINAL, HENRY S.
DATE FILED : 2018-08-14
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2018-08-15
